vault.name: Vault Name
onboarding.friend.title: Follow the steps to manage crypto with friends
onboarding.friend.step_1: Step 1: Add this bot as contact
onboarding.friend.step_1.text: , and "Add contact" to add this bot.
onboarding.friend.step_2.text_1: Tap your avatar at the right top corner, and then tap "New Group Chat" button.
onboarding.friend.step_2.text_2: Add your friends and this bot into your group.
onboarding.friend.step_2.text_3: Name the group as "GROUP_NAME^N", in which `GROUP_NAME` is the group name, N is approved number in the N/M multisig.
onboarding.friend.step_2.text_4: M is the number of real group members(exclude the bot itself), N should less or equal to M.
onboarding.friend.step_3.text_1: In the group chat, tap the plus button at the bottom left corner. You will see the CoWallet's Icon.
